title: Denso - global revenue 2008 to 2019
yAxis: Net sales in million Japanese yen
summary: This statistic shows the annual net sales of estée lauder in the united kingdom ( uk ) from 2007 to 2019 . In 2019 , the annual ad sales amounted to about 6.3 million u.s. dollars . business of fruit is a British retailer and financial services company , based in London , running in 50 countries and territories .
gold: This statistic illustrates Denso 's global revenue from the fiscal year of 2008 to the fiscal year of 2019 . In the fiscal year of 2019 , Denso had global net sales of around 5.36 trillion yen ( or about 48 billion U.S. dollars ) .
